oaLdCardHardVers.description: Hardware version of the agent card

oaLdCreatinDate.name: oaLdCreatinDate
oaLdCreatinDate.description: Agent software creation date and time

oaLdCardFpgaVers.name: oaLdCardFpgaVers
oaLdCardFpgaVers.description: FPGA version of the agent card

oaLdCardBackplaneVers.name: oaLdCardBackplaneVers
oaLdCardBackplaneVers.description: Chassis backplane version. Value = -1 says, this object is not supported.

oaLdTrapsVer.name: oaLdTrapsVer
oaLdTrapsVer.description: Traps format version. If this object is not suppoted or its value is 1, the traps version is the origin one, traps 15,17,20,23,25,27,28 and 29 are sent. If this object equals 2, then for each reason there is a 'normal' trap and an 'alarm' trap. If this object equals 3, then for each trap, connected to lambda interface, the interface descriptor is added.

oaLdCpuCardSerialNumber.description: The CPU Card's Serial Number (10 digits).

oaLdSoftVersString.description: Agent software version in string presentation

oaLdDevPSNumber.name: oaLdDevPSNumber
oaLdDevPSNumber.description: The number of Power Supplies in the corresponding Device. Value = 0 says, that Power Supply Table is not supported.

oaLdDevPSTable.name: oaLdDevPSTable
oaLdDevPSTable.description: This table shows all the Power Supplies modules, existing in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevPSIndex.name: oaLdDevPSIndex
oaLdDevPSIndex.description: The index of the table, (MAX Value is equal to oaLdDevPSNumber).

oaLdDevPSOperStatus.description: The Oper status of the Power Supply.

oaLdDevPSPartNumber.description: The Part Number of the Power Supply(maximum 15 symbols).

oaLdDevPSSerialNumber.name: oaLdDevPSSerialNumber
oaLdDevPSSerialNumber.description: The Serial Number of the Power Supply(10 digits).

oaLdDevPSHwRev.name: oaLdDevPSHwRev
oaLdDevPSHwRev.description: The Hardware Revision of the Power Supply.

oaLdDevFANsNumber.name: oaLdDevFANsNumber
oaLdDevFANsNumber.description: The number of FANS in the corresponding Device. Value = 0 says, that FAN Table is not supported.

oaLdDevFANTable.name: oaLdDevFANTable
oaLdDevFANTable.description: This table shows all the FANs existing in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevFANIndex.name: oaLdDevFANIndex
oaLdDevFANIndex.description: The index of the table, (MAX Value is equal to oaLdDevFANsNumber).

oaLdDevFANOperStatus.name: oaLdDevFANOperStatus
oaLdDevFANOperStatus.description: The Oper status of the FAN.

oaLdDevCPUNumber.name: oaLdDevCPUNumber
oaLdDevCPUNumber.description: The number of CPU modules in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevCPUTable.name: oaLdDevCPUTable
oaLdDevCPUTable.description: This table shows all the CPU modules, existing in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevCPUIndex.name: oaLdDevCPUIndex
oaLdDevCPUIndex.description: The index of the table, (MAX Value is equal to oaLdDevCPUNumber).

oaLdDevCPUOperStatus.name: oaLdDevCPUOperStatus
oaLdDevCPUOperStatus.description: The Operative status of the CPU module. active - single CPU module or master CPU module in chassis with redundant CPU; standby - slave CPU module in chassis with redundant CPU; reset - slave CPU module in shutdown mode.

oaLdDevCPUType.name: oaLdDevCPUType
oaLdDevCPUType.description: The HW Type of the CPU module. mgtd - regular agent module; mgtp - power agent module with additional HW features.

oaLdDevCPUSerialNumber.name: oaLdDevCPUSerialNumber
oaLdDevCPUSerialNumber.description: The CPU Card's Serial Number (10 digits).

oaLdDevCPUBuildTime.name: oaLdDevCPUBuildTime
oaLdDevCPUBuildTime.description: Agent software creation date and time.

oaLdDevCPUBoardHardVers.name: oaLdDevCPUBoardHardVers
oaLdDevCPUBoardHardVers.description: Hardware version of CPU's base card

oaLdDevRedundantFeature.name: oaLdDevRedundantFeature
oaLdDevRedundantFeature.description: Set Redundant CPU feature on the next boot in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevRedundantMode.name: oaLdDevRedundantMode
oaLdDevRedundantMode.description: Set Redundant CPU mode in the corresponding Device.

oaLdDevRedundantCommand.name: oaLdDevRedundantCommand
oaLdDevRedundantCommand.description: Force a command in the corresponding Device. forceSwitchOver - Force Standby CPU module to become Active; forceSync - Force configuration sync with Standby system.

oaLdDevRedundantPeerAdminStatus.name: oaLdDevRedundantPeerAdminStatus
oaLdDevRedundantPeerAdminStatus.description: Force a command to Slave (peer) CPU module in the corresponding Device. recover - recover peer CPU module by hardware reset; reboot - reboot peer CPU module; shutdown - shutdown peer CPU module and hold it in reset mode.

oaLdCardsStatTable.name: oaLdCardsStatTable
oaLdCardsStatTable.description: A list of all the slots status objects

oaLdCardIndex.name: oaLdCardIndex
oaLdCardIndex.description: The slot#. An index from 1 to The number of slots.

oaLdCardOptAccRx.name: oaLdCardOptAccRx
oaLdCardOptAccRx.description: Slot optic access Rx indication. Indicates the optic access Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdCardOptDwdmRx.name: oaLdCardOptDwdmRx
oaLdCardOptDwdmRx.description: Slot optic DWDM Rx indication. Indicates the optic DWDM Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdCardDwdmLaserTx.name: oaLdCardDwdmLaserTx
oaLdCardDwdmLaserTx.description: Slot DWDM Laser Tx Fail indication. Indicates the DWDM Laser Transmit status 2 - Transmit OK 3 - Transmit Fail

oaLdCardLaserTemp.name: oaLdCardLaserTemp
oaLdCardLaserTemp.description: Slot Laser Temperature indication. Indicates the Laser Temperature status 2 - Temperature Normal 3 - Temperature High

oaLdCardAmbientTemp.name: oaLdCardAmbientTemp
oaLdCardAmbientTemp.description: Slot Ambient Temperature indication. Indicates the Ambient Temperature status 2 - Temperature Normal 3 - Temperature High

oaLdCardRateSelect.name: oaLdCardRateSelect
oaLdCardRateSelect.description: Transponder Rate Select. Indicates the transponder rate. oc48, stm16 and fiberChannel2125 are for card EM2009-CH and EM2009-DH only. sonetSdh10giga and fiberChannel10giga are for module TM2-SFPPXFP only.

oaLdCardRateMode.name: oaLdCardRateMode
oaLdCardRateMode.description: Transponder Rate Mode. Indicates the transponder rate mode. 2 - Automatic - Rate is set by software 3 - Manual - Rate is set by DIP switches on board If manual, oaLdCardRateSelect can not be changed by software.

oaLdCardLaserMode.name: oaLdCardLaserMode
oaLdCardLaserMode.description: Transponder Laser Mode. Indicates the transponder laser mode. 2 - Enable - Laser is enabled 3 - Disable - Laser is disabled (can not transmit)

oaLdCardWdmRxPm.name: oaLdCardWdmRxPm
oaLdCardWdmRxPm.description: Transponder WDM receiver optical power. Indicates the optical power in dBm. To calculate the power use the equation P(dBm)=oaLdCardWdmRxPm/2, when oaLdCardWdmRxPm is a signed number. (171) is returned when this feature is not supported

oaLdCardWdmTxPm.name: oaLdCardWdmTxPm
oaLdCardWdmTxPm.description: Transponder WDM transmitter optical power. Indicates the optical power in dBm. To calculate the power use the equation P(dBm)=oaLdCardWdmTxPm/2, when oaLdCardWdmTxPm is a signed number. (171) is returned when this feature is not supported Note: For TM-DXFP card the optical power are in units of percent (%)

oaLdCardLoopBack.name: oaLdCardLoopBack
oaLdCardLoopBack.description: Transponder LoopBack state. Indicates the transponder LoopBack state. 2 - normal - Transponder card is in non-loopback state 3 - loopback - Transponder card is in loopback state 4 - remoteLoopback - Transponder card is in remote loopback state 5 - localLoopback - Transponder card is in local loopback state Note: options 4 and 5 are available for TM-DXFP card.

oaLdCardRedundantState.name: oaLdCardRedundantState
oaLdCardRedundantState.description: Transponder Redundant Mode. Indicates the transponder redundant mode. 2 - normal - Transponder is in non-redundant mode 3 - redundant - Transponder is in redundant mode

oaLdCardPrimaryState.name: oaLdCardPrimaryState
oaLdCardPrimaryState.description: Transponder Primary/Secondary State. Indicates the transponder Primary/Secondary status. 2 - secondary - Transponder is in secondary state and is not active 3 - primary - Transponder is in primary state and is active

oaLdCardOptAccTx.name: oaLdCardOptAccTx
oaLdCardOptAccTx.description: Slot optic access Tx indication. Indicates the optic access Transmit status 2 - Transmit On 3 - Transmit Off

oaLdCardOptDwdmTx.name: oaLdCardOptDwdmTx
oaLdCardOptDwdmTx.description: Slot optic DWDM Tx indication. Indicates the optic DWDM Transmit status 2 - Transmit On 3 - Transmit Off

oaLdCardTemp.name: oaLdCardTemp
oaLdCardTemp.description: The Module Temperature (in units of 1/10 Degrees Celsius [0.1 C])

oaLdCardEntityStatTable.name: oaLdCardEntityStatTable
oaLdCardEntityStatTable.description: A list of all Entities in a slot and their status objects

oaLdCardEntityCardIndex.name: oaLdCardEntityCardIndex
oaLdCardEntityCardIndex.description: The slot#. An index from 1 to The number of slots.

oaLdCardEntityEntityIndex.name: oaLdCardEntityEntityIndex
oaLdCardEntityEntityIndex.description: The entity#. An index from 1 to The number of entities.

oaLdCardEntityWaveLength.name: oaLdCardEntityWaveLength
oaLdCardEntityWaveLength.description: The Card's entity laser wavelength (Lambda channel) in units of nm (Nanometer). Returns 0 when not applicable

oaLdCardEntityOptAccRx.name: oaLdCardEntityOptAccRx
oaLdCardEntityOptAccRx.description: Entity optic access Rx indication. Indicates the optic access Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmRx.name: oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmRx
oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmRx.description: Entity optic DWDM Rx indication. Indicates the optic DWDM Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdCardEntityDwdmLaserTx.name: oaLdCardEntityDwdmLaserTx
oaLdCardEntityDwdmLaserTx.description: Entity DWDM Laser Tx Fail indication. Indicates the DWDM Laser Transmit status 2 - Transmit OK 3 - Transmit Fail

oaLdCardEntityLaserTemp.name: oaLdCardEntityLaserTemp
oaLdCardEntityLaserTemp.description: Entity Laser Temperature indication. Indicates the Laser Temperature status 2 - Temperature Normal 3 - Temperature High

oaLdCardEntityAmbientTemp.name: oaLdCardEntityAmbientTemp
oaLdCardEntityAmbientTemp.description: Entity Ambient Temperature indication. Indicates the Ambient Temperature status 2 - Temperature Normal 3 - Temperature High

oaLdCardEntityRateSelect.name: oaLdCardEntityRateSelect
oaLdCardEntityRateSelect.description: Transponder Rate Select. Indicates the transponder rate. oc48, stm16 and fiberChannel2125 are for card EM2009-CH and EM2009-DH only

oaLdCardEntityRateMode.name: oaLdCardEntityRateMode
oaLdCardEntityRateMode.description: Transponder Rate Mode. Indicates the transponder rate mode. 2 - Automatic - Rate is set by software 3 - Manual - Rate is set by DIP switches on board If manual, oaLdCardRateSelect can not be changed by software.

oaLdCardEntityLaserMode.name: oaLdCardEntityLaserMode
oaLdCardEntityLaserMode.description: Transponder Laser Mode. Indicates the transponder laser mode. 2 - Enable - Laser is enabled 3 - Disable - Laser is disabled (can not transmit)

oaLdCardEntityWdmRxPm.name: oaLdCardEntityWdmRxPm
oaLdCardEntityWdmRxPm.description: Transponder WDM receiver optical power. Indicates the optical power in units of 1/10 dBm. (oaLdCardEntityWdmRxPm is a signed number.) (999) is returned when this feature is not supported or irrelevant. (-999) is returned when signal is too low.

oaLdCardEntityWdmTxPm.name: oaLdCardEntityWdmTxPm
oaLdCardEntityWdmTxPm.description: Transponder WDM transmitter optical power. Indicates the optical power in units of 1/10 dBm. (oaLdCardEntityWdmTxPm is a signed number.) (999) is returned when this feature is not supported or irrelevant. (-999) is returned when signal is too low.

oaLdCardEntityLoopBack.name: oaLdCardEntityLoopBack
oaLdCardEntityLoopBack.description: Transponder LoopBack state. Indicates the transponder LoopBack state. 2 - normal - Transponder entity is in non-loopback state 3 - loopback - Transponder entity is in loopback state 4 - remoteLoopback - Transponder entity is in remote loopback state 5 - localLoopback - Transponder entity is in local loopback state Note: options 4 and 5 are available for TM2-D4G-SFP card.

oaLdCardEntityRedundantState.name: oaLdCardEntityRedundantState
oaLdCardEntityRedundantState.description: Transponder Redundant Mode. Indicates the transponder redundant mode. 2 - normal - Transponder is in non-redundant mode 3 - redundant - Transponder is in redundant mode

oaLdCardEntityPrimaryState.name: oaLdCardEntityPrimaryState
oaLdCardEntityPrimaryState.description: Transponder Primary/Secondary State. Indicates the transponder Primary/Secondary status. 2 - secondary - Transponder is in secondary state and is not active 3 - primary - Transponder is in primary state and is active

oaLdCardEntityClockSource.name: oaLdCardEntityClockSource
oaLdCardEntityClockSource.description: OCM Module Port Clock Source State. Indicates the Port Clock Source. 2 - Port 1 - Module Clock Source is port 1 3 - Port 2 - Module Clock Source is port 2 4 - Port 3 - Module Clock Source is port 3 5 - Port 4 - Module Clock Source is port 4 6 - Port 5 - Module Clock Source is port 5 or Trunk port according to module type 7 - Port 6 - Module Clock Source is port 6 8 - Port 7 - Module Clock Source is port 7 9 - Port 8 - Module Clock Source is port 8 10 - Port 9 - Module Clock Source is Trunk port

oaLdCardEntityTransparency.name: oaLdCardEntityTransparency
oaLdCardEntityTransparency.description: OCM Module Transparency State. Indicates the Module transparency state. 2 - transparent - Module is in transparency mode 3 - no transparent - Module is in non transparency mode

oaLdCardEntityStandard.name: oaLdCardEntityStandard
oaLdCardEntityStandard.description: OCM Module Standard Mode. Indicates the Module Standard. 2 - sonet - Module in SONET standard mode 3 - sdh - Module in SDH standard mode

oaLdCardEntityAccessLinState.name: oaLdCardEntityAccessLinState
oaLdCardEntityAccessLinState.description: Transponder LIN status. Indicates the transponder access LIN status. 2 - Enable - Access LIN is enabled 3 - Disable - Access LIN is disabled

oaLdCardEntityLineCoding.name: oaLdCardEntityLineCoding
oaLdCardEntityLineCoding.description: Indicates the T1 cards Line Coding. 2 - B8ZS - Bipolar 8-zero substitution encoding 3 - AMI - Alternate Mark Inversion encoding

oaLdCardEntityUartBaudRate.name: oaLdCardEntityUartBaudRate
oaLdCardEntityUartBaudRate.description: Indicates the T1 cards UART Baud Rate configuration.

oaLdCardEntityUartParity.name: oaLdCardEntityUartParity
oaLdCardEntityUartParity.description: Indicates the T1 cards UART Parity configuration.

oaLdCardEntityUartStopBit.name: oaLdCardEntityUartStopBit
oaLdCardEntityUartStopBit.description: Indicates the T1 cards UART Stop Bit configuration. 1 - Stop Bit 1 x data bit, 2 - Stop Bit 1.5 x data bit.

oaLdCardEntityPmMode.name: oaLdCardEntityPmMode
oaLdCardEntityPmMode.description: Module Performance Monitoring Mode. Indicates the Module Performance Monitoring mode. 2 - Enable - PM is enabled 3 - Disable - PM is disabled

oaLdCardEntityWdmFecMode.name: oaLdCardEntityWdmFecMode
oaLdCardEntityWdmFecMode.description: The Forward Error Correction (FEC) mode which is used in the module. 2 - g709 - Standard G.709 FEC mode. 3 - eFec - Enhanced FEC proprietary mode. 4 - byPass - Bypass FEC mode (no FEC). 5 - uFec - Ultra FEC mode.

oaLdCardEntityMinDispDist.name: oaLdCardEntityMinDispDist
oaLdCardEntityMinDispDist.description: Minimum Dispersion distance of integrated TODC. (0) is returned when this feature is not supported Units: ps/nm

oaLdCardEntityMaxDispDist.name: oaLdCardEntityMaxDispDist
oaLdCardEntityMaxDispDist.description: Maximum Dispersion distance of integrated TODC. (0) is returned when this feature is not supported Units: ps/nm

oaLdCardEntityDispDist.name: oaLdCardEntityDispDist
oaLdCardEntityDispDist.description: Dispersion distance of integrated TODC. Units: ps/nm

oaLdCardEntityCCMode.name: oaLdCardEntityCCMode
oaLdCardEntityCCMode.description: EM1600-4CC10G Module cross connection mode. dual1234 - Dual transponder mode, when port 1 <-> 2, port 3 <-> 4. dual1324 - Dual transponder mode, when port 1 <-> 3, port 2 <-> 4. dual1423 - Dual transponder mode, when port 1 <-> 4, port 2 <-> 3. protectRxMon - Protection with RX Monitor mode. protectTxMon - Protection with TX Monitor mode. multicast2 - Multicast mode, when port 2 is back. multicast3 - Multicast mode, when port 3 is back. multicast4 - Multicast mode, when port 4 is back. loopbackPerPort - Remote Loop Back for all ports mode

oaLdCardEntityOptAccTx.name: oaLdCardEntityOptAccTx
oaLdCardEntityOptAccTx.description: Entity optic access Tx indication. Indicates the optic access Transmit status 2 - Transmit On 3 - Transmit Off

oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmTx.name: oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmTx
oaLdCardEntityOptDwdmTx.description: Entity optic DWDM Tx indication. Indicates the optic DWDM Transmit status 2 - Transmit On 3 - Transmit Off

oaLdCardEntityEMCfgType.name: oaLdCardEntityEMCfgType
oaLdCardEntityEMCfgType.description: Specifies the E&M Lead Signaling type.

oaLdCardEntityEMCfgSide.name: oaLdCardEntityEMCfgSide
oaLdCardEntityEMCfgSide.description: Specifies the side of the unit: trunkCircuitSide - Trunk Circuit Side signalingUnitSide - Signaling Unit Side Usualy the PBX is the trunk circuit side and the telco, CO is the signaling unit side.

oaLdCardEntityPreemptionMode.name: oaLdCardEntityPreemptionMode
oaLdCardEntityPreemptionMode.description: EM1600-4CC10G Module preemption mode for TX or RX Protection cross connect. In two following preemption modes one of access ports has priority to be active in case of two links are ON. port2 - Port 2 has priority to be active if two links are ON for bith ports 2 and 3. port3 - Port 3 has priority to be active if two links are ON for bith ports 2 and 3. noPreemption - first linked port is active.

oaLdCardEntityActivePort.name: oaLdCardEntityActivePort
oaLdCardEntityActivePort.description: EM1600-4CC10G Module actual active port for TX or RX Protection cross connect.

oaLdCardEntityOperationMode.name: oaLdCardEntityOperationMode
oaLdCardEntityOperationMode.description: other - Modue does not support this feature. normal- Normal operational mode. yCableRedundant - For TM2-XFP module redundancy mode. repeater - For TM2-XFPF module - connects between the two WDM ports for 10GE LAN repeater functionality. repeaterWan - For TM2-XFPF module - connects between the two WDM ports for 10GE WAN repeater functionality. Next modes for module TM2-SFPXC: dualTransponder - as regular Dual Transponder module. broadcastUni - connects between WDM to three Access ports unidirectional. crossTransponder - connects as dual transponder between opposite WDM and Access ports. mux2WDM1Access - connects between two WDM ports for mux to one Access port.

oaLdCardEntityRedundantType.name: oaLdCardEntityRedundantType
oaLdCardEntityRedundantType.description: Redundant operation mode, (applicable only for modules that support this features) other - Module does not support this feature, normal - No redundant mode, dualSlotRedundancy - Redundancy mode between the same entity of two sequential slots, singleSlotRedundancy - Redundancy mode between two entities at the same module

oaLdCardEntityOtu2MappingMode.name: oaLdCardEntityOtu2MappingMode
oaLdCardEntityOtu2MappingMode.description: For entities that enables mapping of clients into the OTN payload. The mode will indicate about the method of OTU-2 Line mapping. Based on that mode the user is able to build his services. none - Module does not support this feature. basicMode - The default mode. In this mode the output payload format is independently configured based on user's request. All known clients are available. extendedMode1 - In this mode the output payload format is configured to Vcat 4xOTU-1 for GFP-T model. The user is able to add fibre-channel and Eth-1G clients. extendedMode2 - In this mode the output payload format is configured to Vcat 4xOTU-1 for GFP-F model. The user is able to add SDI (Video) and Ethernet clients.

oaLdCardEntityDispDistAdmin.name: oaLdCardEntityDispDistAdmin
oaLdCardEntityDispDistAdmin.description: Administrative calibration factor for Dispersion distance of integrated TODC. Units: ps/nm

oaLdRedundantOpticTable.name: oaLdRedundantOpticTable
oaLdRedundantOpticTable.description: Table of installed Lambda Driver Redundant Optical Cards

oaLdRedundantOpticEntry.name: oaLdRedundantOpticEntry
oaLdRedundantOpticEntry.description: Installed Lambda Driver Redundant Optical Cards

oaLdRedOptSlotNumber.name: oaLdRedOptSlotNumber
oaLdRedOptSlotNumber.description: The slot#. An index from 1 to The number of slots

oaLdRedOptSwitchPosition.name: oaLdRedOptSwitchPosition
oaLdRedOptSwitchPosition.description: Switch Position: 2 - Receive from Primary fiber. 3 - Receive from Secondary fiber. Note: a command to set the switch to a non received fiber will be ignored.

oaLdRedOptLastCommand.name: oaLdRedOptLastCommand
oaLdRedOptLastCommand.description: Indicates who issue the last command automatic - by hardware manual - by software

oaLdRedOptPrimaryRx.name: oaLdRedOptPrimaryRx
oaLdRedOptPrimaryRx.description: Indicates the Primary fiber Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdRedOptSecondaryRx.name: oaLdRedOptSecondaryRx
oaLdRedOptSecondaryRx.description: Indicates the Secondary fiber Receive status 2 - Receive On 3 - Receive Off

oaLdCardPortsStatTable.name: oaLdCardPortsStatTable
oaLdCardPortsStatTable.description: Table of installed Lambda Driver Cards with more then one port

oaLdCardPortsStatEntry.name: oaLdCardPortsStatEntry
oaLdCardPortsStatEntry.description: Installed Lambda Driver Cards with more then one port

oaLdCardPortsSlotNumber.name: oaLdCardPortsSlotNumber
oaLdCardPortsSlotNumber.description: The slot#. An index from 1 to The number of slots

oaLdCardPortsPortNumber.name: oaLdCardPortsPortNumber
oaLdCardPortsPortNumber.description: The port#. An index from 1 to The number of ports

oaLdCardPortsLink.name: oaLdCardPortsLink
oaLdCardPortsLink.description: Indicates the link status of the port 2 - link on 3 - link off

oaLdCardPortsActivity.name: oaLdCardPortsActivity
oaLdCardPortsActivity.description: Indicates the activety status of the port 2 - activety on 3 - activety off

oaLdCardPortsWaveLength.name: oaLdCardPortsWaveLength
oaLdCardPortsWaveLength.description: The port laser wavelength (Lambda channel) in units of nm (Nanometer). Returns 0 when not applicable

oaLdCardPortsLoopBack.name: oaLdCardPortsLoopBack
oaLdCardPortsLoopBack.description: Transponder LoopBack state. Indicates the transponder LoopBack state. 2 - normal - Transponder card is in non-loopback state 3 - remoteLoopback - Transponder card is in remote loopback state 4 - localLoopback - Transponder card is in local loopback state 5 - lineLoopbackEnable - OCM module is in (LLEB) line loopback enable state 6 - diagnosticLoopbackEnable - OCM module is in (DLEB) diagnostic loopback enablestate

oaLdCardPortsCounters.name: oaLdCardPortsCounters
oaLdCardPortsCounters.description: When read : 1 - Counter feature is NOT supported 2 - Counter feature is supported 4 - Extended ethernet counters are supported When write: 3 - Clear all port conters

oaLdCardPortsCounter1Low.name: oaLdCardPortsCounter1Low
oaLdCardPortsCounter1Low.description: The number of bytes received at the port. This object returns the least significant 32 bits of a 64 bits counter. To calculate the actual counter reading, use the following formula: oaLdCardPortsCounter1High * (2^32) + oaLdCardPortsCounter1Low.

oaLdCardPortsCounter1High.name: oaLdCardPortsCounter1High
oaLdCardPortsCounter1High.description: The number of bytes received at the port. This object returns the most significant 32 bits of a 64 bits counter. To calculate the actual counter reading, use the following formula: oaLdCardPortsCounter1High * (2^32) + oaLdCardPortsCounter1Low.

oaLdCardPortsCounter2Low.name: oaLdCardPortsCounter2Low
oaLdCardPortsCounter2Low.description: The number of error bytes received at the port. This object returns the least significant 32 bits of a 64 bits counter. To calculate the actual counter reading, use the following formula: oaLdCardPortsCounter2High * (2^32) + oaLdCardPortsCounter2Low.

oaLdCardPortsCounter2High.name: oaLdCardPortsCounter2High
oaLdCardPortsCounter2High.description: The number of error bytes received at the port. This object returns the most significant 32 bits of a 64 bits counter. To calculate the actual counter reading, use the following formula: oaLdCardPortsCounter2High * (2^32) + oaLdCardPortsCounter2Low.

oaLdCardPortsConnectorType.name: oaLdCardPortsConnectorType
oaLdCardPortsConnectorType.description: Port Connector Types: other - 1 - Unknown type of connector static- 2 - Not Changeable (fix) type of connector gbic - 3 - GBIC type of connector sfp - 4 - SFP type of connector xfp - 5 - XFP type of connector xfpe - 6 - XFPE type of connector

oaLdCardPortsConnectorSubType.name: oaLdCardPortsConnectorSubType
oaLdCardPortsConnectorSubType.description: Port Connector Physical Sub Type: other -1 - Unknown or N/A Connector's connectivity Type rj45 -2 - Copper RJ45 sc -3 - Regular Fibre Optic [FO] lc -4 - LC mtrj -5 - MT-RJ vf -6 - VF mu -7 - MU miniCoax-8 - mini Coaxical Connector mdiCx -9 - SFF-8470 MDI Connector bnc -10- BNC (Bayonet Neil-Concelman Connector)

oaLdCardPortsLineLength.name: oaLdCardPortsLineLength
oaLdCardPortsLineLength.description: T1 ports line length: other - 1 - Unknown line length from0to133 - 2 - line length 0 - 133 ft. (0.6 dB) from133to266 - 3 - line length 133 - 266 ft. (1.2 dB) from266to399 - 4 - line length 266 - 399 ft. (1.8 dB) from399to533 - 5 - line length 399 - 533 ft. (2.4 dB) from533to655 - 6 - line length 533 - 655 ft. (3.0 dB)

oaLdCardPortsAccessLinState.name: oaLdCardPortsAccessLinState
oaLdCardPortsAccessLinState.description: Port LIN status. Indicates the Port access LIN status. 2 - Enable - Access LIN is enabled 3 - Disable - Access LIN is disabled

oaLdCardPortsFlowControlMode.name: oaLdCardPortsFlowControlMode
oaLdCardPortsFlowControlMode.description: Module Flow Control Mode. Indicates the flow control mode for 10GbE access. 2 - Enable - Flow Control is enabled 3 - Disable - Flow Control is disabled

oaLdCardPortsDryContactStat.name: oaLdCardPortsDryContactStat
oaLdCardPortsDryContactStat.description: Port Dry Contact State. Indicates the Port Dry Contact State. 2 - open - Dry Contact is open 3 - close - Dry Contact is close

oaLdCardPortsPowerTuning.name: oaLdCardPortsPowerTuning
oaLdCardPortsPowerTuning.description: Port Power Tuning in dB of the E&M signal. (20) is returned if this value is undefined.

oaLdCardPortsEMCfgOperation.name: oaLdCardPortsEMCfgOperation
oaLdCardPortsEMCfgOperation.description: Specify the operation of the E&M signal. twoWires - 2-wire operation. fourWires - 4-wire operation.

oaLdCardPortsEyemaxState.name: oaLdCardPortsEyemaxState
oaLdCardPortsEyemaxState.description: EyeMax state mode, (applicable only for ports that support this (EYEMAX) features) other - Port does not support this feature, disable - no Eyemax mode, scanning - start scan process, tracking - start tracking process, calibrating - set the 'oaLdCardPortsEyemaxAdminFactor' value into DAC, stopTracking - stop track process.

oaLdCardPortsEyemaxOperFactor.name: oaLdCardPortsEyemaxOperFactor
oaLdCardPortsEyemaxOperFactor.description: EyeMax Operational Calibrate factor, This value represents current DAC output. When this feature is not supported (0) is returned. Units: percent.

oaLdCardPortsEyemaxAdminFactor.name: oaLdCardPortsEyemaxAdminFactor
oaLdCardPortsEyemaxAdminFactor.description: EyeMax Administrative Calibration factor, This value is represents the value to be set into DAC. After scan operation it holds the optimal value that should be set into DAC. Users are able to set any value (0-100%) in order to change DAC outputs. (0) is returned when this feature is not supported Units: percent.

oaLdCardPortsFefMode.name: oaLdCardPortsFefMode
oaLdCardPortsFefMode.description: Port Far End Failure (FEF) Detection mode. 2 - Enable - FEF is enabled 3 - Disable - FEF is disabled

oaLdCardPortsOdu1Index.name: oaLdCardPortsOdu1Index
oaLdCardPortsOdu1Index.description: For clients that mapped into the OTN payload. Indicates the index of the OPU-1 payload area. 0 - not supported, or client is not configured. 1 - Client mapped into OPU-1 #1 payload area. 2 - Client mapped into OPU-1 #2 payload area. 3 - Client mapped into OPU-1 #3 payload area. 4 - Client mapped into OPU-1 #4 payload area.

oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsIndex.name: oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsIndex
oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsIndex.description: For clients that mapped into the OTN payload. Indicates the tributary slot index among the 16 tributary slots, of the OPU-1 payload area. 0 - not supported, or client is not configured. [1-16] - Tributary slot index.

oaLdCardPortsPmMode.name: oaLdCardPortsPmMode
oaLdCardPortsPmMode.description: Port Performance Monitoring Mode. Indicates the Port Performance Monitoring mode. 2 - Enable - PM is enabled for this port 3 - Disable - PM is disabled for tthis port

oaLdCardPortsFecMode.name: oaLdCardPortsFecMode
oaLdCardPortsFecMode.description: The Forward Error Correction (FEC) mode which is used in the selected port. 2 - g709 - Standard G.709 FEC mode. 3 - eFec - Enhanced FEC proprietary mode. 4 - byPass - Bypass FEC mode (no FEC). 5 - g9751i4 - G.975.1 Annex I.4 enhanced FEC. 6 - g9751i7 - G.975.1 Annex I.7 enhanced FEC.

oaLdCardPortsLock.name: oaLdCardPortsLock
oaLdCardPortsLock.description: Port PLL lock mode. 2 - locked - PLL was locked, 3 - notlocked - PLL was not locked

oaLdCardPortsLaserMode.name: oaLdCardPortsLaserMode
oaLdCardPortsLaserMode.description: Port Laser Mode. Indicates the port laser mode. 2 - Enable - Laser is enabled 3 - Disable - Laser is disabled (can not transmit)

oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsSize.name: oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsSize
oaLdCardPortsOdu1TsSize.description: For clients that mapped into the OTN payload. Indicates the number of tributary slots that are occupied by the client's rate. 0 - not supported, or client is not configured.

oaLdCardPortsPriorityClockSource.name: oaLdCardPortsPriorityClockSource
oaLdCardPortsPriorityClockSource.description: Defines the port's priority in relation to the clock source. 1 defines the highest priority index and the last port index defines the least prioritized port. The highest priority port if available is used as the clock source, when it is not available the 2-nd highest available port would be used as the clock source.

oaLdCardPortsAutoShutdownMode.name: oaLdCardPortsAutoShutdownMode
oaLdCardPortsAutoShutdownMode.description: Port Auto Shutdown Mode. Indicates the port Auto Shutdown (eye safe) mode. 2 - Enable - Auto Shutdown mode is enabled 3 - Disable - Auto Shutdown mode is disabled

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctr.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctr
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctr.description: Initialization value for Amlification Factor used in the Eyemax scanning operation in 0.1 units.

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMin.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMin
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMin.description: Minimum value that can be set for Initialization of the Amlification Factor used in the Eyemax scanning operation in 0.1 units.

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMax.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMax
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnAmpFctrMax.description: Maximum value that can be set for Initialization of the Amlification Factor used in the Eyemax scanning operation in 0.1 units.

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnDspComps.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnDspComps
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnDspComps.description: Initialization value for Dispersion Compensation used in the Eyemax scanning operation.

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnTreshold.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnTreshold
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnTreshold.description: Initialization value for Rx threshold used in the Eyemax scanning operation.

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnOperComplt.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnOperComplt
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnOperComplt.description: Indication how much of the scanning operation have been already completed (in percents 0 - 100).

oaLdCardPortsEymxScnResult.name: oaLdCardPortsEymxScnResult
oaLdCardPortsEymxScnResult.description: Indication if the scanning operation ended properly or finished with problems.

oaLdOAmplifierCardAlarmStatus.name: oaLdOAmplifierCardAlarmStatus
oaLdOAmplifierCardAlarmStatus.description: The Optical Amplifier Alarms. This object is organised as a bit map. Each bit represents an alarm. If the object is zero - no alarm is active. 0x0000 ('0000 0000 0000 0000'B) - Normal (No alarm) 0x0001 ('0000 0000 0000 0001'B) - Optical Input alarm 0x0002 ('0000 0000 0000 0010'B) - Optical Output alarm 0x0004 ('0000 0000 0000 0100'B) - Optical Input 2 0x0008 ('0000 0000 0000 1000'B) - Module Temperature alarm 0x0010 ('0000 0000 0001 0000'B) - Pump Temperature 0x0020 ('0000 0000 0010 0000'B) - Pump Drive Current alarm 0x0040 ('0000 0000 0100 0000'B) - Power Supply Voltage alarm 0x0080 ('0000 0000 1000 0000'B) - Auto-shutdown 0x0100 ('0000 0001 0000 0000'B) - Reflected Power High alarm Any combination of the bits represent the combination of the alarms

oaLdOAmplifierCardAttributes.name: oaLdOAmplifierCardAttributes
oaLdOAmplifierCardAttributes.description: The Optical Amplifier Attributes. This object is organised as a bit map. Each bit represents one existed attribute. 0x0000 ('0000 0000 0000 0000'B) - No additional attributes 0x0001 ('0000 0000 0000 0001'B) - Dispersion attribute is on 0x0002 ('0000 0000 0000 0010'B) - Mid Stage attribute is on 0x0004 ('0000 0000 0000 0100'B) - Tunable Gain attribute is on 0x0008 ('0000 0000 0000 1000'B) - High Power attribute is on 0x0010 ('0000 0000 0001 0000'B) - Double slots module is on Other bitmasks are reserved. Any combination of the bits represent the combination of the attributes
